mean_cn: n. 学究式人物，书呆子，卖弄学问的人
mean_en: a person who annoys other people by correcting small errors and giving too much attention to minor details
sentence: He's always correcting me on my grammar and spelling! What a pedant.
sentence_trans: 他老是纠正我的语法和拼写错误！真是个书呆子！
word_etyma: ped教育 ＋ ant人 → 钻研教育的人 → pedant学究式人物
